Dating: 1ST INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); 1ST INTERMEDIATE PERIOD; MIDDLE KINGDOM (not after)
Name: False door stela of Khety
Description: False door stela which belonged to Khety. The exterior surface has sustained heavy damage, which can be explained by its having been found in an area which was flooded with water.  Because of this, of the inscriptions, which have all but disappeared, only the name is legible.
